title: 未核实： 驻德国大使威胁德国： 如果你们的电信不包括华为，你们会有后果的。
contents:
驻德国大使威胁德国： 如果你们的电信不包括华为，你们会有后果的。你们每年销售百万辆汽车，我们可以宣布它们不安全。。。。。
https://twitter.com/Wang1Yw/status/1205577978907955200

At
@handelsblatt
event, Chinese ambassador Wu issues clear threat to Germany: „If you decide to exclude Huawei this will have consequences. You sell million cars per year in China. We may also declare them unsafe“. (from min 26). Gloves are off.
https://twitter.com/thorstenbenner/status/1205547443389157376
